Mirza's Lady

Ano: 2016

IMDb ID: tt4940456

Classificação: 4.6

Sinopse: The story is interspersed with images of a competition between a prince and a poor horse-riding warrior, for the hand of a Princess. The warrior wins the competition and presents himself as a suitor to the Princess. The prince attacks the warrior, and the warrior to ready to retaliate. The Princess distracts the warrior as she does not bloodshed and indicates for him to leave. The Princess is betrothed to the prince. She knows that this is a political alliance more than a marriage. The Princess goes secretly to meet the warrior. The Princess has a dream of being attacked by the prince and his army and the warrior shooting at them. The Princess doesn't want bloodshed and breaks the warrior's arrows while he sleeps. When the Prince attacks, the warrior has one arrow left and kills the prince with it and is killed since he has no more arrows to defend himself. The Princess kills herself as well.Adil Mirzya (Harshvardhan Kapoor) is a horse groomsman who reconnects with his childhood friend Suchitra (Saiyami Kher), the daughter of a Police Commissioner (Art Malik).It is implied that Adil and Suchitra used to study together in childhood & were close to each other. Adil and Suchitra are in the same class. One day, Adil is late to school as he brings some berries for Suchitra and consequently misses the school bus. Adil enters the class in the middle of the period. The teacher notices this and asks Adil for his homework. Suchitra gives Adil her notebook to show to the teacher. Then the teacher asks for Suchitra's notebook, and she has to admit that she did not complete her homework. The teacher punished Suchitra for something that Adil did. Suchitra covered for him and took the punishment. In retaliation, Adil shoots the teacher. He is jailed in juvenile detention, but later escapes and goes to meet Suchitra, but by then Suchitra is made to shift towns by her parents.Karan (Anuj Choudhry) is a successful businessman but belongs to a royal family. Suchitra's dad is the police commissioner of the area and is planning to get Suchitra engaged to Karan. Suchitra and Karan are very much in love.Unknown to Suchitra, Adil has been tracking her and gets a job in Karan's stable farm. Adil spends time with Suchitra when she expresses a desire to learn horse riding and Adil is given the responsibility.As Suchitra gets to be friends with Adil, she talks about her classmate whom she remembers fondly. That's when Suchitra realizes that Adil is her classmate and her childhood friend. Abba (Om Puri) is the blacksmith of the town, who live with his daughter Zeenat (Sathya Bg). Adil was adopted by Abba when he escaped from Juvenile prison and hence, he considers Zeenat his sister. But Zeenat secretly has a crush on Adil.Suchi is angry with Adil for abandoning her in childhood. To spite him, she gets engaged to Karan. But then, has longing for Mirzya and comes to the stable at night and has sex with him. In a night safari, Suchi is attacked by a leopard. Adil risks his life to save both Suchi and Karan (who is knocked unconscious in the attack).Adil approaches Suchi's dad and reveals that he is the boy who studied with Suchi in school & killed the teacher. He asks for Suchi's hand in marriage, but Suchi's father kicks him out of the house. When Karan comes to know, he takes Adil for a night safari, shoots him & then leaves him for dead as he watches a leopard approach the injured Adil.Suchitra's father forces her to agree to the wedding, threatening that he would kill himself otherwise. On the day of her wedding to Karan, Suchi escapes from the house (after receiving a message from Adil via Zeenat) & runs away on a bike with Adil, who is alive. Since Zeenat knows Adil does not love her, she slits her wrists in Suchitra's room after she leaves. Suchitra's dad initiates a police search. Eventually they are located, and Karan and Suchi's father follow their trail.Meanwhile Adil's bike runs out of fuel in the middle of the desert. At night, knowing they are being pursued, Suchi realizes that Adil has a gun and intends to shoot their pursuers, which will include Karan and Suchi's father.When Adil nods off, she empties his gun. The next morning, they are attacked. Adil manages to kill Karan with the one bullet he has left. He is shot & killed by Suchi's dad. Suchi commits suicide.
